name: 魔界ノ花 Deamon Flower
description:
Story:

魔界ノ花

Deamon Flower

Our heroine is a demon who want to improve her living environment.

so she(a demon) brings some flowers from a garden of human.

She want to plant them in front of her home as a decoration.

But....

The flower will be unexpectedly polluted by the environment of devildom!

She must purify it with her mana!

Genre

Action Game

How to play?

- press `j` to any plant. it will feed healthy plant and purify polluted plant.
- gain fruit to win mana point.
- use `space` to upgrade
- polluted fruit will explode and infect other plants.
- plant will die if it's polluted fruit explode.
- gain polluted fruit to prevent explosion

MOVE - wsad

FEED/PURIFY - j

JUMP - k

DASH - l

UPGRADE - space, 1,2,3,4,5,6   for different abilities

How to win?

Don't let the amount of dead flowers exceed to Stage limit.

Save plants as soon as possible and wait timeup.
